name: AC vs. Damage Type Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'AC Modifier' field to the category specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Attacks Per Round Modifier
description: Alters a characters Attacks per Round, by changing the Key by the modifier value specified by the 'Key Value' field, in the style specified by 'Type' field.

name: Cure sleep
description: Removes the state_sleeping flag from the targeted creature(s). This effect ignores durations attributed to it. Does not remove the state_helpless flag.

name: Berserk
description: Applies the berserk effect to the targeted creature(s). Target will uncontrollably attack enemies if any are in view, and will occasionally attack neutral creatures. The affected creature becomes berserk and its AI scripts stop running. Grants a +2 bonus to hit and damage with all weapons. It also sets the STATE_BERSERK flag. This opcode only affects party members.

name: Cure berserk
description: Removes the state_beserk flag from the targeted creature(s). This effect only affects Player Characters. This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Charm creature
description: Charms the targeted creature(s) according to value in the 'Charm Type' field, if the target is matched by the value in the 'General Type' field. Values for 'General Type' are from General.ids.

name: Charisma Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Constitution Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Cure poison
description: Removes the poison effect from the targeted creature(s). This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Damage
description: Damages the target by the value specified by the 'Damage Amount' field, with the damage type specified by the 'Type' field. The Dice values can be used to inflict varying damage amounts.

name: Instant Death
description: Instantly kills the targeted creature(s), in the style specified by the 'Death Type' value.

name: Defrost (Graphics)
description: Removes the frozen_death state from the targeted creature(s).

name: Dexterity Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Haste
description: Applies the Haste effect, in the style specified by the 'Type' value.  This effect will cancel out the slow opcode.

name: Current HP Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Maximum HP Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Intelligence Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Invisibility
description: Applies the invisibility effect, in the style specified by the 'Type' value.

name: Lore Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Luck bonus
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field. Luck affects the minimum damage caused by a weapon (up to the normal maximum damage of the weapon) and the attack roll modifier (up to a maximum of 20, excluding natural attack roll modifiers, e.g. high STR, invisibility etc) by 'Statistic Modifier' amount. 'Statistic Modifier' also affects the damge rolls of opponents (in feature blocks, not extension headers). The effect does not set STATE_LUCK.

name: Reset morale
description: Sets the Morale stat of the targetted creature(s) to 10.

name: Panic
description: Applies the horror effect to the targeted creature(s).

name: Poison
description: Damages the target by the 'Damage Amount' value, in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Remove curse
description: Removes cursed items from the targeted creature(s).

name: Acid resistance modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Cold resistance modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Electricity resistance modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Fire resistance modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Magic damage resistance modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Raise dead
description: Raises the targeted creature(s) from the dead. This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Save vs. death modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Save vs. wand modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Save vs. polymorph modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Save vs. breath modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Save vs. spell modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Silence
description: Applies the silence effect to the targeted creature(s). A silenced creature cannot cast spells, use special abilities or initiate dialog. The engine is hard-coded to allow SPWI219 (Vocalize) and SPIN649 (Teleport to Pocket Plane) to be cast by a silenced creature.

name: Sleep
description: Applies the unconsciousness effect to the targeted creature(s). NB. A permanent timing mode will set the state_helpless flag.

name: Slow
description: Applies the slow effect to the targeted creature(s). This effect will cancel out the haste opcode. NB. This effect doubles the casting time of all spells.

name: Sparkle
description: Displays the sparkle effect specified by the 'Type' field, in the colour specified by the 'Colour' field. The colour field may be connected to sprkclr.2da.

name: Wizard Spell Slots Modifier
description: Alters the number of wizard spell slots available to the targeted creature(s), as specified by the 'Slot Amount Modifier' field, at the level specified by the 'Spell Level' field.

name: Stone to flesh
description: Changes the targeted creature(s) from stone to flesh.

name: Strength Modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Stun
description: Stuns the targeted creature(s).

name: Cure stun
description: Unstuns the targeted creature(s). This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Remove invisibility
description: Removes the invisibility effect from the targeted creature(s). This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Cure silence
description: Removes the silence effect and the silenced state from the targeted creature(s). This effect ignores durations attributed to it.

name: Wisdom bonus
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Modify collision behavior
description: This effect allows the targetted creature(s) to push other creatures out of the way while moving. Constant Value should be set to 1. The effect modifies stat 190 to param 2.

name: Critical Hit Modifier
description: This effect improves the Critical Hit chances. Critical hits will occur on a roll (on a 1d20) greater or equal to: 20 - 'Statistic Modifier'

name: Can use any item
description: The targeted creature(s) can use any item. The Constant Value parameter should be set to 1. The effect modifies stat 191.

name: Backstab every hit
description: The targeted creature(s) will backstab with every hit. The Constant Value parameter should be set to 1. The effect modifies stat 192.

name: Mass raise dead
description: This effect will raise multiple dead PCs and NPCs.

name: Off-hand THAC0 modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Main hand THAC0 modifier
description: Applies the modifier value specified by the 'Statistic Modifier' field in the style specified by the 'Type' field.

name: Ranger Tracking Ability
description: Activates the Tracking Ability. A string from tracking.2da is shown, and arrows appear along the screen edge pointing to any creatures within range. The units of the range parameter are unknown. The arrow effect may be hardcoded to spell SPCL922. NB: The file 'tracking.2da' lists the string reference that shows what information is learned from using this effect for each area.

name: Immunity to Tracking
description: Protects the targetted creature(s) from the Tracking arrows effect (has no affect on the area string displayed). The effect modifies stat 195 to the value of param type.

name: Script: Modify Local Variable
description: Set both the local variable specified by the resource key to the value specified by the 'Value' field.

name: Immunity to time stop
description: The targeted creature(s) becomes immune to time-stop. The Constant Value parameter should be set to 1. The effect modifies stat 197.

name: Wish
description: This effect casts a wish spell (SPWISH01 - SPWISH25), selected based on the casting creatures Wisdom attribute.

name: Immunity to sequester
description: This effect crashes the game.

name: High-Level Ability Denotation
description: This effect denotes that the high level ability specified by the resource key has been gained. Used for pre-requisites/count limits.

name: Golem Stoneskin
description: Gives the targeted creature(s) a number of protections from physical attacks, as specified by the 'Amount' field. NB: Do not use this effect in conjunction with the Juggernaut Golem Manual as it will corrupt the use of that item.

name: Remove animation
description: This effect will remove the animation of the targeted creature(s). The Constant Value parameter should be set to a non-zero value. The effect modifies stat 201.

name: Rest
description: This effect will refresh spells and remove any fatigue.

name: Haste 2
description: Applies the Haste effect, in the style specified by the 'Type' value.

name: Restrict item
description: This effect restricts the item to creature(s) matching the object identifiers. The string to display when an invalid creature attempts to use the item is held in 0x2c.

name: Change weather
description: Changes the weather of the current area to the weather specified by 'Weather'.

name: Remove effects by resource
description: Removes effects from the resource specified by the resouce key, in the style specified by the 'Type' field.
